snippet.title: Silent Hill - Experience PSP (UMD video)
snippet.description:
(Full UMD video capture from PSP)

WELCOME TO SILENT HILL
The Silent Hill Experience takes viewers on a visualy stunning and musical ride into the shadowy depths of Silent Hill. Combining diffrent forms of media including digital comics, music and video, the Silent Hill Experience provides fans a unique look 

into one of the most terrifying game franchises of all tome.
FEATURES:
- View over 2 hours of digital comics based on the popular Silent Hill comic series, presented with haunting music.
- Includes the acclaimed comic series Silent Hill: Dying Inside and a brand new Silent Hill story, 'The Hunger'.
- 20 unforgettable music tracks selected from series' producer and music composer Akira Yamaoka.
- Exclusive video interview with the director of the Silent Hill movie, Christophe Gans, and series' music composer Akira Yamaoka.
- Rare video content from previous Silent Hill games.

ⓒ Konami 2006
